scene.name: intro
scene.line: `(Yelling.)` The water is fine! Invigorating. It makes me want to run. I could gallop up and down this beach like a horse!
`(To METZSTEIN.)` What's he yelling about?
He wants to run on the beach. Like a horse, he says.
`(To SHANNON.)` Oh dear, what's in these drinks? Ha ha.
scene.option: You folks work at the Bureau.
Your friend's laying in the sand over there; I think he's asleep.

scene.name: drinks
scene.line: But deceptively sweet.
Mine's not very sweet at all, actually. It's just sort of ... pleasant.
I really meant "rich," I think. With a sweet aroma.

scene.name: bureau
scene.line: We're celebrating!
We just hit a big milestone, you know.
`(THE CLERKS both pause, waiting for the other to speak.)`
Well? Tell her about it!
But I don't know anything more than you do. It wasn't part of my caseload.
Well it wasn't part of `mine`. I wonder just what we're celebrating.
It doesn't matter.

scene.name: rick
scene.line: Poor Rick. He's a lightweight.
I think he just drank too fast. It's easy to get carried away. Oh, he always gets so `melancholy` when he drinks.
Remember? The office picnic at that big, flat rock ...
Oh, I remember. He was talking Lula's ear off. She slipped away, and he sat on the ground, nursing that brown bottle, crying! Sobbing about "the days that are no more."
Poor Rick. It'll never be.

scene.name: luis-interruption
scene.line: `(Yelling.)` Invigorating!
`(Yelling to LUIS.)` Catch anything, Luis?
So. Did you find what you were looking for? With Lula, I mean.

scene.name: work-in-progress
scene.line: I know what you mean. I've been working on —

scene.name: is-lula-here
scene.line: I'm not sure `where` she is, now that you mention it. Before we left the office, she —

scene.name: luis-second-interruption
scene.line: `(Yelling.)` I think I `will` go for a run along the beach. As soon as I'm finished with this drink.
Try not to yell so loud, Luis, I'm afraid you'll shake the ceiling loose!
